p: Since the discovery, LB technique has been used as an ideal method for a broad range of scientific research [ 2, 50, 51, 52, 53, 54, 55, 56, 57]. Most of the recent research work in the area of Langmuir and LB films are inspired by the pioneering research work done by H. Kuhn [ 71, 72]. It is the Kuhn, who demonstrated that LB technique can be used to manipulate the organization of functional molecule with in complex assemblies in a desired manner.
